title: Cannot login after finishing game
body:
Is there a bug right now bcoz I cannot log-in in the server after finishing game had to log-out due to black screen and now I cannot log-in

Help please :/ I am stuck in logging on...

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Ko5mAyOo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-31T05:54:08.449+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> Are you still experiencing this issue?

yeah I am having this issue and I don't know why, as I have NBN so I believe its not an internet problem bcoz other things are working fine, as I believe it might be internet problem so I try with my 4G but having same problem, right now its fine but 3 hours before I was having same difficulty :/
